activities: Personal Information regarding prospective,current, and former Mallinckrodt employees in the EU/EAA and/or Switzerland is transferred to the US for customary and legitimate business purposes, such as reaching decisions regarding hiring, placement, and promotion; providing compensation and benefits; offering training and career development; supporting other Human Resources programs and services; meeting legal, audit, and insurance requirements; and ensuring compliance with other Mallinckrodt policies.  Also, Personal Information regarding patients, customers, suppliers, and health care professionals located in the EU/EAA and/or Switzerland is transferred to the US for customary and legitimate purposes, such as clinical research; product safety and quality monitoring activities; providing education and training; expense management; supporting business operations; meeting legal, audit, and insurance requirements; and ensuring compliance with Mallinckrodt policies.
